en: In order for the app to personalize the feedback provided to you, we recommend that you input your personal information. Tap 'Settings' to proceed.
da: For at appen kan tilpasse information til dine individuelle behov, bedes du indtaste dine personlige oplysninger. Tryk på 'Indstillinger' for at fortsætte.
nl: Druk op 'Instellingen' om de app te personaliseren.
sv: In order for the app to personalize the feedback provided to you, we recommend that you input your personal information. Tap 'Settings' to proceed.
no: For at appen skal tilpasse tilbakemeldingene du får, anbefaler vi at du legger inn den personlige informasjonen din. Trykk på 'Innstillinger' for å fortsette.
el: In order for the app to personalize the feedback provided to you, we recommend that you input your personal information. Tap 'Settings' to proceed.
it: Per permettere alla app di personalizzare i feedback forniti, raccomandiamo di inserire in input le tue informazioni personali. Cliccare ‘Impostazioni’ per procedere
de: Wenn sich die App Ihre Rückmeldungen anpassen soll, empfehlen wir, dass Sie Ihre persönliche Informationen eingeben. Drücken Sie auf dem 'Dashboard' um weiterzumachen
es: In order for the app to personalize the feedback provided to you, we recommend that you input your personal information. Tap 'Settings' to proceed.
fr: Pour que l'app puisse personnaliser le retour qui vous est donné, nous vous recommandons d'entrer vos informations personnelles. Appuyer sur 'Paramètres' pour continuer.

en: If you do not feel like doing so, no problem, the app will use predefined values instead. Tap 'Dashboard' to proceed.
da: Hvis du ikke vil indtaste dine personlige oplysninger vil appen benytte foruddefinerede værdier. Tryk på 'Instrumentbræt' for at fortsætte.
nl: Als je daar geen behoefte aan hebt, druk dan op 'Dashboard'
sv: If you do not feel like doing so, no problem, the app will use predefined values instead. Tap 'Dashboard' to proceed.
no: Hvis du ikke har lyst til å gjøre det, er det ikke noe problem, da vil appen bruke forhåndsdefinerte verdier i stedet. Trykk på 'Dashbord' for å fortsette.
el: If you do not feel like doing so, no problem, the app will use predefined values instead. Tap 'Dashboard' to proceed.
it: Se preferisci non fare così, non ti preoccupare, la app utilizzerà i valori predefiniti. Selezionare ‘Dashboard’ per continuare
de: Wenn das Ihnen nicht gefällt, ist es kein Problem, da die App stattdessen vorher definierten Werte verwendet. Drücken Sie auf dem 'Dashboard' um weiterzumachen.
es: If you do not feel like doing so, no problem, the app will use predefined values instead. Tap 'Dashboard' to proceed.
fr: Si vous ne voulez pas le faire, pas de problème, l'app utilisera des valeurs prédéfinies à la place. Appuyer sur 'Tableau de bord' pour continuer.

en: The bandwidth corresponds to uncertainty for the heat of the sun due to clouds.
da: Bredere områder indikerer forventet variation i varmebelastningen pga. skyer.
nl: The bandwidth corresponds to uncertainty for the heat of the sun due to clouds.
sv: The bandwidth corresponds to uncertainty for the heat of the sun due to clouds.
no: De bredere områdene svarer til usikkerheten for solvarmen på grunn av skyer.
el: The bandwidth corresponds to uncertainty for the heat of the sun due to clouds.
it: La larghezza della barra corrisponde all’incertezza sul calore del sole dovuto alle nuvole.
de: Die Bandbreite enspricht die Unsicherheit der Hitze von der Sonne wegen der Wolken.
es: The bandwidth corresponds to uncertainty for the heat of the sun due to clouds.
fr: La largeur de la bande correspond à l'incertitude sur la chaleur du soleil à cause des nuages.

fr: Appuyer sur les boutons pour ajuster le niveau à votre expérience thermique.

en: Several new features will be implemented over the course of the next two years. Therefore all users should be informed that frequent updates and changes to the layout and content might occur.
da: Denne applikation er stadig under udvkling. Nye funktionaliteter vil blive tilføjet i løbet af de næste to år. Af denne årsag informerer vi brugeren om, at hyppige opdateringer og ændringer til indhold og design kan forekomme.
nl: Several new features will be implemented over the course of the next two years. Therefore all users should be informed that frequent updates and changes to the layout and content might occur.
sv: Several new features will be implemented over the course of the next two years. Therefore all users should be informed that frequent updates and changes to the layout and content might occur.
no: Denne applikasjonen er fortsatt under utvikling. Flere nye funksjoner blir implementert i løpet av de neste to årene. Derfor informeres brukere om at hyppige oppdateringer og endringer i layout og innhold kan forekomme.
el: Several new features will be implemented over the course of the next two years. Therefore all users should be informed that frequent updates and changes to the layout and content might occur.
it: Questa applicazione è ancora in fase di sviluppo. Molte nuove funzionalità saranno implementate durante i prossimi due anni. Informiamo pertanto tutti gli utenti che potrebbero essere effettuati frequenti aggiornamenti e cambi al layout ed al contenuto
de: Diese Applikation ist weiterhin in Entwicklung. Mehere neue Funktionen werden im Laufe der nächsten zwei Jahren implementiert. Deswegen wird der Benutzer darum informiert, dass häufige Aktualisierungen und Änderungen in Layout und Inhalt vorkommen können.
es: Several new features will be implemented over the course of the next two years. Therefore all users should be informed that frequent updates and changes to the layout and content might occur.
fr: Cette application est encore en cours de développement. De nombreuses nouvelles fonctionnalités seront ajoutées au cours des deux prochaines années. Par conséquent, tous les utilisateurs doivent être informés que des mises à jour fréquentes et des changements de la mise en page et du contenu peuvent avoir lieu.

en: The European Research Area for Climate Services (ERA4CS) and its partners assume no responsibility or liability for any errors or omissions in the content of this application. The information contained in this app is provided on an “as is” basis with no guarantees of completeness, accuracy, usefulness or timeliness.
da: Det Europæiske Forskningsområde for Klimaservices (ERA4CS) og dennes partnere tager intet ansvar for fejl eller mangler i indholdet af denne app. Informationen er givet på en "as-is" basis uden garanti for fuldkommenhed, nøjagtighed, brugbarhed eller aktualitet.
nl: The European Research Area for Climate Services (ERA4CS) and its partners assume no responsibility or liability for any errors or omissions in the content of this application. The information contained in this app is provided on an “as is” basis with no guarantees of completeness, accuracy, usefulness or timeliness.
sv: The European Research Area for Climate Services (ERA4CS) and its partners assume no responsibility or liability for any errors or omissions in the content of this application. The information contained in this app is provided on an “as is” basis with no guarantees of completeness, accuracy, usefulness or timeliness.
no: Det europeiske forskningsområdet for klimatjenester (ERA4CS) og dets partnere påtar seg intet ansvar for eventuelle feil eller mangler i innholdet i denne applikasjonen. Informasjonen i denne appen blir gitt på en "as-is" basis uten garantier for fullstendighet, nøyaktighet, brukbarhet eller aktualitet.
el: The European Research Area for Climate Services (ERA4CS) and its partners assume no responsibility or liability for any errors or omissions in the content of this application. The information contained in this app is provided on an “as is” basis with no guarantees of completeness, accuracy, usefulness or timeliness.
it: L’area di ricerca europea per i servizi climatici (ERA4CS) e i suoi partner non si assume alcuna responsabilità od obbligazione per ogni errore od omissione nel contenuto di questa applicazione. Le informazioni contenute in questa app sono fornite “così come sono” senza alcuna garanzia di completezza, accuratezza, utilità o tempismo.
de: Das "European Research Area for Climate Services" (ERA4CS) und seine Partner nehmen keine Verantwortung für eventuelle Fehler und Mängel im Inhalt dieser Applikationen an. Die Informationen in dieser App werden auf ein "as-is"-basis ohne Garantien für Vollständigkeit, Genauigkeit, Verwenbarkeit oder Aktualität gegeben
es: The European Research Area for Climate Services (ERA4CS) and its partners assume no responsibility or liability for any errors or omissions in the content of this application. The information contained in this app is provided on an “as is” basis with no guarantees of completeness, accuracy, usefulness or timeliness.
fr: Le centre européen de recherche pour les services climatiques (ERA4CS) et ses partenaires ne prennent aucune responsabilité ou engagement en cas d'erreurs ou d'omissions dans le contenu de cette application. Les informations contenues dans cette app sont fournies telles qu'elles sans garantie d'exhaustivité, d'exactitude, d'utilité ou de ponctualité.

en: Based on your activity level there is no indication for heat or cold stress when you are dressed in casual office clothing.
da: Baseret på dit aktivitetsniveau er der ingen indikation af varme- eller kuldestress, når du har tøj der minder om afslappet kontortøj på.
nl: Based on your activity level there is no indication for heat or cold stress when you are dressed in casual office clothing.
sv: Based on your activity level there is no indication for heat or cold stress when you are dressed in casual office clothing.
no: Basert på aktivitetsnivået ditt er det ingen indikasjoner på varme eller kulde stress når du er kledd i casual office-klær.
el: Based on your activity level there is no indication for heat or cold stress when you are dressed in casual office clothing.
it: Basandosi sul tuo livello di attività, non sono presenti indicazioni riguardo agli stress da caldo o da freddo quando viene indossato abbigliamento da ufficio casual.
de: Basiert auf Ihre Aktivitätsebene gibt es keine Indikationen auf Hitze- oder Kältebelastung, wenn Sie lässige Bürokleidung tragen.
es: Based on your activity level there is no indication for heat or cold stress when you are dressed in casual office clothing.
fr: Etant donné votre niveau d'activité, il n'y a pas d'indication de stress hyper ou hypothermique quand vous portez une tenue de travail décontractée.

di stress termico da caldo o da freddo su una scala da -4 a 4

fr: La jauge indique le niveau de stress hyper ou hypothermique attendu sur une échelle de -4 à 4

da: Dette område giver generel information om det aktuelle vejr.
nl: This area provides basic information about the current weather.
sv: This area provides basic information about the current weather.
no: Dette området gir grunnleggende informasjon om det nåværende været.
el: This area provides basic information about the current weather.
it:
Questa area fornisce informazioni di base riguardo al meteo
corrente
de: Dieser Bereich gibt grundlegende Information über das jetzige Wetter.
es: This area provides basic information about the current weather.
fr: Cette zone fournit des informations de base sur la météo actuelle.

en: This bar allows for swiping between the forecasted weather data of today to see how the weather is predicted to change during the day.
da: Dette område gør det muligt at "swipe" mellem vejrudsigter, så du kan få en oversigt over, hvordan vejret bliver i løbet af dagen.
nl: This bar allows for swiping between the forecasted weather data of today to see how the weather is predicted to change during the day.
sv: This bar allows for swiping between the forecasted weather data of today to see how the weather is predicted to change during the day.
no: Denne linjen gjør det mulig å sveipe mellom dagens prognoserte værdata for å se hvordan været er spådd å endre seg i løpet av dagen.
el: This bar allows for swiping between the forecasted weather data of today to see how the weather is predicted to change during the day.
it:
Questa barra permette di
scorrere i dati delle previsioni di oggi, per vedere come è previsto che il meteo cambi durante la giornata
de: Diese Linie ermöglicht ein Swipen zwischen die heutigen vorhergesagten Wetterdaten, um die vorausgesagte, heutige Wetterentwicklung zu sehen.
es: This bar allows for swiping between the forecasted weather data of today to see how the weather is predicted to change during the day.
fr: Cette barre permet de parcourir les données météorologiques prévues pour aujourd'hui pour voir comment il est prévu que la météo évolue pendant la journée.

en: The data is given in 3 hour intervals.
da: Informationen bliver leveret i 3-timers intervaller.
nl: The data is given in 3 hour intervals.
sv: The data is given in 3 hour intervals.
no: Dataene blir gitt i 3 timers intervaller.
el: The data is given in 3 hour intervals.
it:
I dati sono forniti a intervalli
di 3 ore
de: Die Daten werden in Intervallen von drei Stunden gegeben.
es: The data is given in 3 hour intervals.
fr: Les données sont données par intervalles de 3 heures.

en: This area describes how to cope with the current weather.
da: Dette område beskriver hvordan vi anbefaler at du forholder dig til det aktuelle vejr.
nl: This area describes how to cope with the current weather.
sv: This area describes how to cope with the current weather.
no: Dette området beskriver hvordan du skal takle det nåværende været.
el: This area describes how to cope with the current weather.
it:
Questa area descrive come comportarsi con le
condizioni meteo attuali
de: Dieser Bereich beschreibt wie Sie mit dem jetzigen Wetter umgehen.
es: This area describes how to cope with the current weather.
fr: Cette zone décrit comment faire face à la météo actuelle.

en: This area gives you additional details and advice on how to cope with the current climatic situation.
da: Dette område giver ekstra information og råd ifm. det aktuelle vejr.
nl: This area gives you additional details and advice on how to cope with the current climatic situation.
sv: This area gives you additional details and advice on how to cope with the current climatic situation.
no: Dette området gir deg flere detaljer og råd om hvordan du takler den nåværende klimatiske situasjonen.
el: This area gives you additional details and advice on how to cope with the current climatic situation.
it:
Questa area fornisce ulteriori
dettagli e consigli riguardo a come comportarsi con la situazione climatica attuale
de: Dieser Bereich gibt Ihnen weitere Detaillen und Räte dazu, wie Sie mit der jetzigen Klimasituation umgehen.
es: This area gives you additional details and advice on how to cope with the current climatic situation.
fr: Cette zone vous donne des détails supplémentaires et des conseils sur comment faire face à la situation climatique actuelle.

en: Press more info to read more.
da: Tryk på mere info for at læse mere.
nl: Press more info to read more.
sv: Press more info to read more.
no: Trykk på mer informasjon for å lese mer.
el: Press more info to read more.
it: Clicca ulteriori informazioni per saperne di più.
de: Drücken Sie auf mehrere Information um mehr zu erfahren.
es: Press more info to read more.
fr: Appuyer sur plus d'infos pour en savoir plus.

en: This bar allows you to set your estimated activity level, clothing level and whether you are wearing any head gear. This allows for the app to better adapt to your situation.
da: I dette område bedes du angive bedste estimat afdit aktivitetsniveau, det tøj du har på og hvorvidt du har hovedbeklædning på. Dette tilpasser appen bedre til din situation.
nl: This bar allows you to set your estimated activity level, clothing level and whether you are wearing any head gear. This allows for the app to better adapt to your situation.
sv: This bar allows you to set your estimated activity level, clothing level and whether you are wearing any head gear. This allows for the app to better adapt to your situation.
no: Denne linjen lar deg angi ditt estimerte aktivitetsnivå, klesnivå og om du har på deg hodeplagg. Dette gjør det mulig for appen å tilpasse seg bedre til din situasjon.
el: This bar allows you to set your estimated activity level, clothing level and whether you are wearing any head gear. This allows for the app to better adapt to your situation.
it:
Questa barra permette di selezionare
la stima del tuo livello di attività, di abbigliamento e se indossi un qualche tipo di copricapo. Questo permette alla app di adattarsi meglio alla tua situazione.
de: Diese Linie lässt Ihnen Ihre geschätzte Aktivitätsebene, Kleidungebene und ob Sie Kopfbedeckung tragen eingeben. Dieses ermöglicht der App sich besser an Ihre Situation anzupassen.
es: This bar allows you to set your estimated activity level, clothing level and whether you are wearing any head gear. This allows for the app to better adapt to your situation.
fr: Cette barre vous permet de saisir votre niveau d'activité estimé, niveau de protection vestimentaire et si vous portez un chapeau. Cela permet à l'app de mieux s'adapter à votre situation.

en:
You switch between the different categories by clicking on the headers.

You can read more about the different levels in the description at the bottom.
da:
Du kan skifte mellem de forskellige kategorier ved at klikke på fanerne

Nederst kan læse mere om de forskellige niveauer.
nl:
You switch between the different categories by clicking on the headers.

You can read more about the different levels in the description at the bottom.
sv:
You switch between the different categories by clicking on the headers.

You can read more about the different levels in the description at the bottom.
no:
Du veksler mellom de forskjellige kategoriene ved å klikke på overskriftene.

Du kan lese mer om de forskjellige nivåene i beskrivelsen nederst.
el:
You switch between the different categories by clicking on the headers.

You can read more about the different levels in the description at the bottom.
it:
Puoi passare da una categoria all'altra cliccando sulle diverse intestazioni.

Puoi avere maggiori informazioni riguardo ai diversi livelli nelle descrizioni in basso.
de:
Sie wechseln zwischen die verschiedenen Kategorien beim Klicken der Überschriften.

Sie können mehr über die verschiedenen Ebenen in der Beschreibung am unten erfahren.
es:
You switch between the different categories by clicking on the headers.

You can read more about the different levels in the description at the bottom.
fr:
Vous pouvez passer d'une catégorie à l'autre en cliquant sur les en-têtes.

Vous pouvez en lire plus sur les différents niveaux dans la description en bas.

en: The green level means that low thermal stress is forecasted.
da: Når din score ligger i det grønne område indikerer det, at det forventede termiske stress er lavt.
nl: The green level means that low thermal stress is forecasted.
sv: The green level means that low thermal stress is forecasted.
no: Det grønne nivået betyr at lav termisk belastning er forventet.
el: The green level means that low thermal stress is forecasted.
it: Il livello verde significa che non è previsto alcuno stress termico
de: Die grüne Ebene bedeutet, dass niedrige thermische Strahlung erwartet wird.
es: The green level means that low thermal stress is forecasted.
fr: Le niveau vert signifie qu'un faible stress thermique est prévu.

en: The cyan level means that moderate cold stress is expected.
da: Når din score ligger i det cyan-blå område, er moderat kuldestress forventet.
nl: The cyan level means that moderate cold stress is expected.
sv: The cyan level means that moderate cold stress is expected.
no: Cyannivået betyr at det forventes moderat kuldestress.
el: The cyan level means that moderate cold stress is expected.
it:
Il livello turchese significa
che è previsto un moderato stress termico da freddo.
de: Das cyan Niveau bedeutet, dass moderate Kältebelastung erwartet wird.
es: The cyan level means that moderate cold stress is expected.
fr: Le niveau cyan signifie qu'un stress hypothermique modéré est prévu.

en: The blue level means that high cold stress is expected.
da: Når din score ligger i det blå område, betyder det, at der er høj risiko for kuldestress.
nl: The blue level means that high cold stress is expected.
sv: The blue level means that high cold stress is expected.
no: Det blå nivået betyr at det forventes høyt kuldestress.
el: The blue level means that high cold stress is expected.
it:
Il livello blu significa che è previsto un elevato
stress termico da freddo.
de: Das blaue Niveau bedeutet, dass hohe Kältebelastung erwartet wird.
es: The blue level means that high cold stress is expected.
fr: Le niveau bleu signifie qu'un stress hypothermique élevé est prévu.

en: Due to the windchill
da: På grund af windchill
nl: Due to the windchill
sv: Due to the windchill
no: På grunn av windchill
el: Due to the windchill
it: Dovuto al windchill
de: Wegen des Windchills
es: Due to the windchill
fr: A cause de la température ressentie

en: there is a risk for exposed skin to freeze in
da: er der stor risiko for at udsat hud vil blive kritisk afkølet om
nl: there is a risk for exposed skin to freeze in
sv: there is a risk for exposed skin to freeze in
no: er det en stor risiko for at utsatt hud vil fryse om
el: there is a risk for exposed skin to freeze in
it:
esiste il rischio di congelamento
della pelle esposta
de: gibt es eine große Risiko dafür, dass exponierte Haut in
es: there is a risk for exposed skin to freeze in
fr: il y a un risque pour la peau exposée de geler dans

en: minutes
da: minutter
nl: minutes
sv: minutes
no: minutter
el: minutes
it: minuti
de: Minuten frieren wird
es: minutes
fr: minutes

en: This level is associated with severe cold stress.
da: Dette niveau er forbundet med alvorlig kuldestress.
nl: This level is associated with severe cold stress.
sv: This level is associated with severe cold stress.
no: Dette nivået er assosiert med alvorlig kuldestress.
el: This level is associated with severe cold stress.
it:
Questo livello è associato
ad un grave stress termico da freddo
de: Dieses Niveau wird mit ernsthafter Kältebelastung assoziiert.
es: This level is associated with severe cold stress.
fr: Ce niveau est associé à un stress hypothermique sévère.

en: The personalised cold stress indicator depends on the weather report as well as your personal input
da: Den personlige indikator for kuldestress er afhængig af vejrrapporten såvel som dit personlige input
nl: The personalised cold stress indicator depends on the weather report as well as your personal input
sv: The personalised cold stress indicator depends on the weather report as well as your personal input
no: Den personlige indikatoren for kuldestress er avhengig av værmeldingen så vel som dine personlige informasjoner
el: The personalised cold stress indicator depends on the weather report as well as your personal input
it:
L'indicatore personalizzato dello stress termico da freddo
dipende dai report meteorologici e dagli input da te inseriti
de: Der persönliche Indikator der Kältebelastung ist von den Wetterberichten sowohl als Ihren persönlichen Daten abhängig
es: The personalised cold stress indicator depends on the weather report as well as your personal input
fr: L'indicateur de stress hypothermique personnalisé dépend des données météo et de vos paramètres personnels.

en: The score will increase towards higher warning levels if the weather aggravates, your activity level decreases or your clothing level decreases
da: Scoren stiger mod højere advarselsniveauer, hvis vejret forværres, dit aktivitetsniveau falder eller du tager noget af dit tøj af
nl: The score will increase towards higher warning levels if the weather aggravates, your activity level decreases or your clothing level decreases
sv: The score will increase towards higher warning levels if the weather aggravates, your activity level decreases or your clothing level decreases
no: Poengsummen vil øke mot høyere advarselsnivå hvis været forverres, aktivitetsnivået ditt synker eller mengden av klær du har på blir mindre
el: The score will increase towards higher warning levels if the weather aggravates, your activity level decreases or your clothing level decreases
it:
Il punteggio aumenterà verso livelli
di avviso più elevati se il tempo peggiorerà, oppure se diminuirà la tua attività o il tuo abbigliamento
de: Wenn sich das Wetter verschlechtert, das Aktivitätsebene senkt oder Sie weniger Kleider tragen, wird die Punktzahl zu einem höheren Warnungsniveau steigen
es: The score will increase towards higher warning levels if the weather aggravates, your activity level decreases or your clothing level decreases
fr: Le score augmentera vers des niveaux d'alerte plus élevés si la météo s'aggrave, si votre niveau d'activité diminue ou si votre niveau de protection vestimentaire diminue.

en: No special precautions are required unless you work/excercise in special settings (indoor) or with restricted ability to maintain heat
da: Ingen særlige forholdsregler, medmindre du arbejder / træner i specielle omgivelser (indendørs) eller med en begrænset evne til at opretholde varmen
nl: No special precautions are required unless you work/excercise in special settings (indoor) or with restricted ability to maintain heat
sv: No special precautions are required unless you work/excercise in special settings (indoor) or with restricted ability to maintain heat
no: Ingen spesielle forholdsregler er nødvendig med mindre du jobber/trener i spesielle omgivelser (innendørs) eller med begrenset evne til å opprettholde varmen
el: No special precautions are required unless you work/excercise in special settings (indoor) or with restricted ability to maintain heat
it:
Non sono richieste precauzioni particolari a meno che non lavori o faccia movimento
in ambienti particolari (interni) o con ridotta abilità di mantenere il calore
de: Keine besonderen Maßnahmen werden benötigt, es sei denn Sie in besonderen Umgebungen (Innen) oder mit begrenztem fähigkeit die Temperatur aufrechtzuerhalten arbeiten/trainieren
es: No special precautions are required unless you work/excercise in special settings (indoor) or with restricted ability to maintain heat
fr: Aucune précaution particulière n'est requise sauf si vous travaillez/faites de l'exercice dans un environnement spécial (à l'intérieur) ou avec une capacité limitée de maintenir la chaleur

en: You should be able to maintain normal activities - but appropriate/adjusted behavior is required.
da: Du burde være i stand til at opretholde normale aktiviteter, men justeret adfærd (påklædning/væskeindtagelse) kan være nødvendig
nl: You should be able to maintain normal activities - but appropriate/adjusted behavior is required.
sv: You should be able to maintain normal activities - but appropriate/adjusted behavior is required.
no: Du burde kunne opprettholde normale aktiviteter - men det krever justert oppførsel
el: You should be able to maintain normal activities - but appropriate/adjusted behavior is required.
it:
Dovresti essere in grado di continuare le tue 
normali attività - però sono necessari comportamenti appropriati/adattati.
de: Sie sollten normale Aktivitäten aufrechterhalten können, aber es fordert ein justiertes Benehmen.
es: You should be able to maintain normal activities - but appropriate/adjusted behavior is required.
fr: Vous devriez être capable de maintenir des activités normales - mais un comportement approprié est requis.

en: There is significant windchill
da: Der er betydelig windchill
nl: There is significant windchill
sv: There is significant windchill
no: Det er betydelig windchill
el: There is significant windchill
it: E' presente un significativo windchill
de: Es gibt ein signifikanter Windchill
es: There is significant windchill
fr: Il y a un refroidissement éolien significatif

en: you should consider clothing with high wind stopping properties.
da: Overvej at vælge tøj der har høj evne til at bremse vind (tøj med wind-breaker egenskaber).
nl: you should consider clothing with high wind stopping properties.
sv: you should consider clothing with high wind stopping properties.
no: bør du vurdere klær med høye vindstoppende egenskaper.
el: you should consider clothing with high wind stopping properties.
it:
dovresti utilizzare un abbigliamento 
in grado di bloccare efficacemente il vento.
de: Sie sollten Kleider mit windstoppenden Eigenschaften überlegen.
es: you should consider clothing with high wind stopping properties.
fr: vous devriez envisager des vêtements avec des propriétés coupe-vent élevées.

en: You should consider to increase insulation from clothing by adding layers or choosing warmer/thicker clothing.
da: Du kan med fordel øge isolering fra dit tøj ved at tage flere lag på, eller vælge varmere/tykkere tøj.
nl: You should consider to increase insulation from clothing by adding layers or choosing warmer/thicker clothing.
sv: You should consider to increase insulation from clothing by adding layers or choosing warmer/thicker clothing.
no: Du bør vurdere å øke isolasjonen fra klær ved å legge til lag eller velge varmere/tykkere klær.
el: You should consider to increase insulation from clothing by adding layers or choosing warmer/thicker clothing.
it:
Dovresti aumentare il livello di isolamento
fornito dai tuoi vestiti, aggiungendo strati o scegliendo vestiti più caldi o più spessi.
de: Sie sollten es überlegen die Wärmedämmung der Kleider durch mehere Schichten oder dickere Kleider zu erhöhen.
es: You should consider to increase insulation from clothing by adding layers or choosing warmer/thicker clothing.
fr: Vous devriez envisager d'augmenter votre isolation vestimentaire en ajoutant des couches ou en choisissant des vêtements plus chauds/épais.

en: At this level you are recommended to pay extra attention to appropriate behavior and match clothing to the cold level and protect exposed skin. Be aware not to overdress, because sweating will cool you down.
da: Ved dette kulde-niveau anbefales det at være ekstra opmærksom på passende adfærd - match dit tøj til kuldestresset og beskyt udsat hud. Vær opmærksom på ikke at tage for meget tøj på, da sved køler dig ned.
nl: At this level you are recommended to pay extra attention to appropriate behavior and match clothing to the cold level and protect exposed skin. Be aware not to overdress, because sweating will cool you down.
sv: At this level you are recommended to pay extra attention to appropriate behavior and match clothing to the cold level and protect exposed skin. Be aware not to overdress, because sweating will cool you down.
no: På dette nivået anbefales du å være ekstra oppmerksom på passende oppførsel og tilpasse klær til kulden samt beskytte utsatt hud. Vær oppmerksom på å ta på for mye klær, fordi svette vil kjøle deg ned.
el: At this level you are recommended to pay extra attention to appropriate behavior and match clothing to the cold level and protect exposed skin. Be aware not to overdress, because sweating will cool you down.
it:
A questo livello ti raccomandiamo di 
prestare particolare attenzione ad assumere i comportamenti corretti, ad adattare gli indumenti al freddo ed a proteggere la pelle esposta. Fai attenzione a non vestirti troppo, altrimenti la sudorazione abbasserà la tua temperatura.
de: Auf dieser Ebene wird es Ihnen empfohlen darauf außerordentich aufmerksam zu sein, dass Sie sich der Kälte entsprechend benehmen und kleiden
es: At this level you are recommended to pay extra attention to appropriate behavior and match clothing to the cold level and protect exposed skin. Be aware not to overdress, because sweating will cool you down.
fr: A ce niveau, il est recommandé de porter une attention particulière à un comportement approprié et d'adapter les vêtements au froid et de protéger la peau exposée. Veillez à ne pas mettre trop de vêtements, car la transpiration vous refroidira.

en: Difference from system prediction
da: Afvigelse fra systemets værdi
nl: Difference from system prediction
sv: Difference from system prediction
no: Forskjell fra systemets verdi
el: Difference from system prediction
it: Differenza dalla previsione del sistema
de: Unterschied von Systemwert
es: Difference from system prediction
fr: Différence avec le système de prédiction

en: Here we show additional information that may be useful for the experienced user.
da: Her vises tekniske informationer som kan være af interesse for erfarne brugere.
nl: Here we show additional information that may be useful for the experienced user.
sv: Here we show additional information that may be useful for the experienced user.
no: Her viser vi tilleggsinformasjon som kan være nyttig for den erfarne brukeren.
el: Here we show additional information that may be useful for the experienced user.
it:
Qui sono presenti ulteriori 
informazioni, che potrebbero essere utili per gli utenti esperti.
de: Hier zeigen wir weitere Informationen, die dem Benutzer nützlich sein können
es: Here we show additional information that may be useful for the experienced user.
fr: Ici, nous montrons des informations supplémentaires qui peuvent être utiles à l'utilisateur expérimenté.

en: Unable to retrieve weather information.
da: Kunne ikke hente vejrinformationer.
nl: Unable to retrieve weather information.
sv: Unable to retrieve weather information.
no: Kunne ikke hente værinformasjon.
el: Unable to retrieve weather information.
it:
Non in grado di recuperare
le informazioni meteo.
de: Wetterinformation nicht aufrufbar
es: Unable to retrieve weather information.
fr: Echec de récupération des données météo.

en: Click on 'colder' or 'warmer' to adjust to your experience
da: Tryk på 'koldere' eller 'varmere' for at tilpasse scoren til din oplevelse
nl: Click on 'colder' or 'warmer' to adjust to your experience
sv: Click on 'colder' or 'warmer' to adjust to your experience
no: Klikk på 'kaldere' eller 'varmere' for å tilpasse hjulet til din opplevelse af været
el: Click on 'colder' or 'warmer' to adjust to your experience
it: Seleziona ‘più caldo’ o ‘più freddo’ per adeguare alla tua sensazione
de: Klicken Sie auf "kälter" oder "wärmer", um Ihre Erfahrung anzupassen
es: Click on 'colder' or 'warmer' to adjust to your experience
fr: Cliquez sur 'plus froid' ou 'plus chaud' pour vous adapter à votre expérience
